body: At least the producer doesn't expect them to finish the challenge in one go. The room got amenities like toilet and kitchen for them to survive a few days (and to have variation rather than only doing it on the bed)

Yuzu got introduced to a part time job with 50k Yen/day pay for her vacation. She signed the contract without understanding what it meant. It's for filming "something a bit lewd", and the theme is that old joke of "the room you can't get out before doing [something]". In this case, you have to fall in love (measured by the meter attached to their neck, monitoring heartbeat and voice). In the end, he made her meter reach 100, but the next trial is awaiting. They need to do lovers sex and orgasm 100 times before the next door unlocks.
for the lack of more understanding, nice art.
Kanraome is unreasonably talented, need them to draw more ASAP!
